Name: Ninja Run
About the game: Run jump slide and battle your way to a high score in Ninja Run by CooperAce Productions -Play as a ninja who can run jump slide and throw ninja stars -Classic side scrolling endless runner -Battle against a huge and terrifying boss -Randomised level generation -Optional difficulty - easy medium and hard -Heaps of obstacles and traps to dodge! such as saw-blades, spinning axes, bombs and missiles! -Choice of background - volcano - graveyard - winter -Track your high score -Enjoy endless hours of unlimited ninja running! -Captivating soundtrack by Kevin Macleod -Designed and created by CooperAce Productions
